backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing the rankings backend with player management, user profiles, and admin-controlled category switching across 10 game categories including the renamed `spearMace` and `diamondSmpNethopSpear`.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that defines old and new ranking data types (renaming `ltms`→`spearMace` and `pot`→`diamondSmpNethopSpear`) and provides a `run` function to migrate actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed rename features: 'LTMs'→'Spear Mace' and 'Pot'→'Diamond SMP Nethop Spear' across multiple frontend files, with associated test IDs and affected components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend source files, describing their roles and noting the category key renames from `ltms`/`pot` to `spearMace`/`diamondSmpNethopSpear`.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file setting up Tailwind base styles and defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including backgrounds, borders, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point titled 'Muti Tiers' that mounts the React app into a `#root` div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that simply renders `RankingsPage` as the sole view.
frontend/src/components/AddPlayerModal.t: Modal dialog for adding a new player with form fields for username, UUID, region, points, title, and per-category tier badges; game mode labels reflect the updated `spearMace` and `diamondSmpNethopSpear` keys.
frontend/src/components/AdminControls.ts: Admin controls component with Add Player and Remove Player buttons that gate actions behind a passcode modal and manage unlock state internally, opening `AddPlayerModal` directly after authentication.
frontend/src/components/CategoryTabs.tsx: Renders a horizontal scrollable tab bar with SVG icons for each game category (Overall, Spear Mace, Vanilla, UHC, etc.), highlighting the active category and calling a callback on tab change.
frontend/src/components/PasscodeModal.ts: A dialog modal that prompts for an admin passcode, validates it against a hardcoded value, and calls onSuccess or shows an error accordingly.
frontend/src/components/PlayerRow.tsx: Renders a single player row in the rankings table, displaying rank position (with gold/silver/bronze styling), Minecraft avatar, username, points, region badge, and tier badges.
frontend/src/components/RankingsTable.ts: Displays a filterable rankings table with a header row, skeleton loading state, and a list of PlayerRow components; shows an empty state when no players match the search query.
frontend/src/components/SearchInput.tsx: A controlled search input component with a search icon, clear button, and keyboard shortcut hint for filtering players by username.
frontend/src/components/TierBadge.tsx: Renders a small colored pill badge showing a player's tier (e.g. HT1, LT3) for a given game category, using category-specific background/border colors and tier-specific text colors.
frontend/src/data/mockData.ts: Defines the CategoryKey type and exports empty mock data structures (mockPlayerData array and MOCK_DATA record) for all ranking categories.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, initializing admin access control if a token is present, and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions and status flags. Includes an `InternetIdentityProvider` component that persists identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating player ranking data from the backend actor, including raw rankings, player search, all players list, and adding a player.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind CSS layers, defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for a forced-dark Minecraft-inspired theme, and adds utility classes for pixelated rendering and rank gradients.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with `QueryClientProvider` and `InternetIdentityProvider` wrapping the root `App` component.
frontend/src/pages/RankingsPage.tsx: Main rankings page component that displays a filterable, categorized leaderboard of players with a navigation bar, category tabs, search input, and admin controls.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters from both standard and hash-based routing, persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive parameters from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with a Minecraft-inspired color palette, pixel and sans font families, custom shadows, border radii, and animation keyframes, with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the project state (version 11) for 'Muti Tiers', a Minecraft PvP rankings app. Documents features, architectural notes, admin passcode protection, and player management requirements.
